Back to Felix Mendelssohn

Felix Mendelssohn

Andante cantabile in B-flat major, MWV U 93

1833

[IMSLP]

This piece was published in 1833 with the presto agitato in G minor (MWV U 94) as a pair of musical sketches. The piece was originally written as the slow introduction to the caprice in B-flat minor (op. 33 no. 3).

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
